INSERT INTO contract(
order_code,
contracting_place,
sellers_type,
user_id,
purchaser_company_name,
purchaser_phone,
purchaser_fax,
purchaser_address,
sellers_company_name,
sellers_phone,
sellers_fax,
sellers_address,
delivery_date,
delivery_address,
freight_and_delivery_charges,
terms_of_payment_and_time_limit,
product_amount,
remarks,
platform_id,
merchant_id,
contract_code,
update_time,
create_time,
) VALUES (
#{orderCode},
#{contractingPlace},
#{sellersType},
#{userId},
#{purchaserCompanyName},
#{purchaserPhone},
#{purchaserFax},
#{purchaserAddress},
#{sellersCompanyName},
#{sellersPhone},
#{sellersFax},
#{sellersAddress},
#{deliveryDate},
#{deliveryAddress},
#{freightAndDeliveryCharges},
#{termsOfPaymentAndTimeLimit},
#{productAmount},
#{remarks},
#{platformId},
#{merchantId},
#{contractCode},
#{updateTime},
#{createTime},
)
select LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.update:
UPDATE contract
order_code = #{orderCode},
contracting_place = #{contractingPlace},
sellers_type = #{sellersType},
user_id = #{userId},
purchaser_company_name = #{purchaserCompanyName},
purchaser_phone = #{purchaserPhone},
purchaser_fax = #{purchaserFax},
purchaser_address = #{purchaserAddress},
sellers_company_name = #{sellersCompanyName},
sellers_phone = #{sellersPhone},
sellers_fax = #{sellersFax},
sellers_address = #{sellersAddress},
delivery_date = #{deliveryDate},
delivery_address = #{deliveryAddress},
freight_and_delivery_charges = #{freightAndDeliveryCharges},
terms_of_payment_and_time_limit = #{termsOfPaymentAndTimeLimit},
product_amount = #{productAmount},
remarks = #{remarks},
platform_id = #{platformId},
merchant_id = #{merchantId},
contract_code = #{contractCode},
update_time = #{updateTime},
create_time = #{createTime},
WHERE id = #{id}
